de.dhbw.ravensburg.verteiltesysteme.server.persistence

Interface DatabaseAccessObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseAccessObjectImpl 

    public interface DatabaseAccessObject
    Basic interface of the persistence layer. Provides general purpose storage operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean createSamplingMessage(java.lang.String messageName, DatabaseSamplingMessage databaseSamplingMessage)
      Stores a DatabaseSamplingMessage

      Delete an already existing object and free the unique identifier respectively

    • Method Detail

      • getSamplingMessage

        java.util.Optional<DatabaseSamplingMessage> getSamplingMessage(@NonNull
                                                               java.lang.String messageName)
        Gets an already existing DatabaseSamplingMessage
        Parameters:
        messageName - the desired sampling message name
        Returns:
        returns a Optional eventually containing a DatabaseSamplingMessage, if there was already an existing one. An empty Optional is beeing returned, if none was existing.

      • createSamplingMessage

        boolean createSamplingMessage(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String messageName,
                              @NonNull
                              DatabaseSamplingMessage databaseSamplingMessage)
        Stores a DatabaseSamplingMessage
        Parameters:
        messageName - the unique identifier of the object to be stored
        databaseSamplingMessage - the object to be stored
        Returns:
        true if there was no previous DatabaseSamplingMessage with the same unique identifier. false if the desired messageName is already taken.

      • writeSamplingMessageContentAndTimestamp

        boolean writeSamplingMessageContentAndTimestamp(@NonNull
                                                java.lang.String messageName,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.lang.String messageContent,
                                                @NonNull
                                                java.time.Instant updateTimestamp)
        Stores additional information to an already existing DatabaseSamplingMessage
        Parameters:
        messageName - the unique identifier of the object to be modified
        messageContent - the new content of the object
        updateTimestamp - the timestamp of the last write
        Returns:
        true if the object was found, false if there was no object associated with the provided unique key

      • deleteSamplingMessage

        boolean deleteSamplingMessage(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String messageName)
        Delete an already existing object and free the unique identifier respectively
        Parameters:
        messageName - the unique key of the object
        Returns:
        true if the object was found, false if there was no object associated with the provided unique key

      • getTotalMessageCount

        long getTotalMessageCount()
        Get the total count of persistent stored messages.
        Returns:
        currently stored messages
